segments.text: Hey , Mark , long time no see .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Julie ! It's good to see you again . How have you been ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . I just got back from a week's vacation in Thailand .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fantastic ! I didn't want to come back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hear the beaches in Thailand are beautiful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They are . And not only that the people are friendly , but also the food is delicious , not to mention cheap .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I do like Thai food . Did you see much of Bangkok ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not much . I've go enough city life in Beijing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know what you mean . I could use a vacation myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey , wouldn't it be great if we could go to Thailand together sometime ?
segments.speaker: S1
